name: Mitigation Playbook for Data Exfiltration via Application Layer Protocols
description: This playbook aims to mitigate the effects of data exfiltration attempts over application layer protocols by executing a series of actions to block malicious traffic, terminate suspicious processes, and scan the system for remaining threats.

action--a3c96de5-c7a2-4cad-a02b-e45f5271.name: Block outbound traffic to suspicious IPs
action--a3c96de5-c7a2-4cad-a02b-e45f5271.description: Block all outbound traffic to suspicious IP addresses identified during the attack.

action--3f5e8fc0-77a2-45ed-96f0-2a94f3d5.name: Kill malicious process
action--3f5e8fc0-77a2-45ed-96f0-2a94f3d5.description: Terminate any malicious processes that may be executing scripts used for exfiltration.

while-condition--b7c4ec8b-8b88-4d49-98c5.name: System Scan Loop
while-condition--b7c4ec8b-8b88-4d49-98c5.description: Repeat scanning of the system until it is clean of threats and anomalies.

action--b7c4ec8b-8b88-4d49-98c5-85be204f.name: Scan system for remaining threats
action--b7c4ec8b-8b88-4d49-98c5-85be204f.description: Perform a detailed scan of the system to detect any remaining threats or anomalies after mitigation actions.
